body_html:
I can confirm that pip install tensorflow works. My configuration - Windows 7, 64 bit. I upgraded to Anaconda 4.4 and python 3.6.2. I had a previous installation of TensorFlow 1.2 installed using the following command pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.3.0rc2-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl

All I had to do was pip uninstall tensorflow followed by pip install tensorflow

I had a previous installation of TensorFlow 1.2 installed using the following command pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.3.0rc2-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl 
All I had to do was pip uninstall tensorflow followed by pip install tensorflow
body:
I can confirm that `pip install tensorflow` works. My configuration - Windows 7, 64 bit. I upgraded to Anaconda 4.4 and python 3.6.2. I had a previous installation of TensorFlow 1.2 installed using the following command `pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.3.0rc2-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl `

All I had to do was `pip uninstall tensorflow` followed by `pip install tensorflow`
